# 随机过程讲义（中科院 孙应飞）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/suiji-guocheng-jiangyi-zhongkeyuan-sunying-fei
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/suiji-guocheng-jiangyi-zhongkeyuan-sunying-fei
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install suiji-guocheng-jiangyi-zhongkeyuan-sunying-fei
suiji-guocheng-jiangyi-zhongkeyuan-sunying-fei <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g suiji-guocheng-jiangyi-zhongkeyuan-sunying-fei
suiji-guocheng-jiangyi-zhongkeyuan-sunying-fei <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
